channel.title: Tommy Tsz-Ming Lee
channel.description: Recent content on Tommy Tsz-Ming Lee

item.title: Research
item.description:
My work can also be found here. Publications Papers: Lee, Tommy Tsz-Ming. 2017. ‘[Defocalization in Cantonese right dislocation]‘ Gengo Kenkyu 152: 59-87. DOI: 10.11435/gengo.152.0_59 .
Proceedings: Lee Tommy Tsz-Ming. 2019. ‘[Head movement with semantic effects: Aspectual verb raising in Cantonese]‘ Proceedings of the Linguistic Society of America (LSA-93) 4(1): 59-1-11. DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3765/plsa.v4i1.4510 . Lee, Tommy Tsz-Ming and Tony Tsz-Fung Lau. 2018. ‘[Deontic modality in Japanese: Positioning the expressions of recommendation]‘ Japanese/ Korean Linguistics 25, eds.
